COMMAND.name: show ip bgp

PARAM.name: neighbors
PARAM.help: Detailed information on TCP and BGP neighbor connections

PARAM.name: received-routes
PARAM.help: Display the received routes from neighbor

PARAM.name: advertised-routes
PARAM.help: Display the routes advertised to a BGP neighbor

COMMAND.ACTION:
if test "${ip subcommands}" = "ipv4"; then
if test "${ipv4 Subcommands}" = "neighbors"; then
if test "${neighbor-subcommands}" = "received-routes"; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py get_adj_rib_in_pre ${vrf-Name} IPV4_UNICAST ${neighbor-ip} show_ip_bgp_routes.j2 ${__full_line}
fi
fi
fi

PARAM.name: vrf-name
PARAM.help: Name of VRF (Max size 32, prefixed by Vrf)

COMMAND.name: graceful-restart preserve-fw-state
COMMAND.help: Enable BGP graceful restart preserve FW state

COMMAND.name: always-compare-med
COMMAND.help: Allow comparing MED from different neighbors

COMMAND.name: read-quanta
COMMAND.help: How many packets to read from peer socket per I/O cycle

COMMAND.name: write-quanta
COMMAND.help: How many packets to write to peer socket per run

COMMAND.name: client-to-client
COMMAND.help: Configure client to client route reflection

PARAM.name: intval-ip
PARAM.help: Route-Reflector Cluster-id as IP address format or 32-bit quantity

COMMAND.name: log-neighbor-changes
COMMAND.help: Log neighbor up/down and reset reason(default)

COMMAND.name: dampening

PARAM.name: reusethr
PARAM.help: Value to start reusing a route

PARAM.name: suppressthr
PARAM.help: Value to start suppressing a route

PARAM.name: maxsuppress
PARAM.help: Maximum duration to suppress a stable route

COMMAND.name: deterministic-med
COMMAND.help: Pick the best-MED path among paths advertised from the neighboring AS

COMMAND.name: disable-ebgp-connected-route-check
COMMAND.help: Disable checking if nexthop is connected on ebgp sessions

COMMAND.name: max-med on-startup

PARAM.name: maxmedval
PARAM.help: Max MED value to be used

COMMAND.name: default ipv4-unicast
COMMAND.help: Activate ipv4-unicast for a peer by default

COMMAND.name: default show-hostname
COMMAND.help: Show hostname in certain command outputs

COMMAND.name: default shutdown
COMMAND.help: Apply administrative shutdown to newly configured peers

COMMAND.name: fast-external-failover
COMMAND.help: Immediately reset session if a link to a directly connected external peer goes down

COMMAND.name: network
COMMAND.help: Check BGP network route exists in IGP

COMMAND.name: route-map
COMMAND.help: Time in secs to wait before processing route-map changes

COMMAND.name: route-map delay-timer
COMMAND.help: Time in secs to wait before processing route-map changes

PARAM.name: delaytm
PARAM.help: 0 disables the timer, no route updates happen when route-maps change

COMMAND.name: route-reflector
COMMAND.help: Allow modifications made by out route-map

COMMAND.name: route-reflector allow-outbound-policy
COMMAND.help: Allow modifications made by out route-map

COMMAND.name: update-delay
COMMAND.help: Force initial delay for best-path and updates

COMMAND.name: bestpath as-path multipath-relax
COMMAND.help: Include prefixes received from different AS path during multipath calculation

COMMAND.name: bestpath as-path ignore
COMMAND.help: Ignore AS path for best path computation

COMMAND.name: bestpath as-path confed
COMMAND.help: Compare path lengths including confederation sets and sequences in selecting a route

PARAM.name: missing-as-worst
PARAM.help: Treat missing MED as the least preferred one

PARAM.name: missing-as-worst
PARAM.help: Treat missing MED as the least preferred one

COMMAND.name: bestpath compare-routerid
COMMAND.help: Compare router-id for identical EBGP paths

COMMAND.name: listen
COMMAND.help: Set the prefix range for dynamic peers

COMMAND.name: no graceful-restart preserve-fw-state
COMMAND.help: Disable BGP graceful restart preserve FW state

COMMAND.name: no always-compare-med
COMMAND.help: Allow comparing MED from different neighbors

COMMAND.name: no read-quanta
COMMAND.help: How many packets to read from peer socket per I/O cycle

COMMAND.name: no write-quanta
COMMAND.help: How many packets to write to peer socket per run

COMMAND.name: no client-to-client
COMMAND.help: Configure client to client route reflection

COMMAND.name: no log-neighbor-changes
COMMAND.help: Log neighbor up/down and reset reason(default)

COMMAND.name: no deterministic-med
COMMAND.help: Pick the best-MED path among paths advertised from the neighboring AS

COMMAND.name: no disable-ebgp-connected-route-check
COMMAND.help: Disable checking if nexthop is connected on ebgp sessions

PARAM.name: maxmedval
PARAM.help: Max MED value to be used

COMMAND.name: no default ipv4-unicast
COMMAND.help: Activate ipv4-unicast for a peer by default

COMMAND.name: no default show-hostname
COMMAND.help: Show hostname in certain command outputs

COMMAND.name: no default shutdown
COMMAND.help: Apply administrative shutdown to newly configured peers

COMMAND.name: no fast-external-failover
COMMAND.help: Immediately reset session if a link to a directly connected external peer goes down

COMMAND.name: no network
COMMAND.help: Check BGP network route exists in IGP

COMMAND.name: no route-map
COMMAND.help: Time in secs to wait before processing route-map changes

COMMAND.name: no route-map delay-timer
COMMAND.help: Time in secs to wait before processing route-map changes

COMMAND.name: no route-reflector
COMMAND.help: Allow modifications made by out route-map

COMMAND.name: no route-reflector allow-outbound-policy
COMMAND.help: Allow modifications made by out route-map

COMMAND.name: no update-delay
COMMAND.help: Force initial delay for best-path and updates

COMMAND.name: no bestpath as-path multipath-relax
COMMAND.help: Include prefixes received from different AS path during multipath calculation

COMMAND.name: no bestpath as-path ignore
COMMAND.help: Ignore AS path for best path computation

COMMAND.name: no bestpath as-path confed
COMMAND.help: Compare path lengths including confederation sets and sequences in selecting a route

PARAM.name: missing-as-worst
PARAM.help: Treat missing MED as the least preferred one

PARAM.name: missing-as-worst
PARAM.help: Treat missing MED as the least preferred one

COMMAND.name: no bestpath compare-routerid
COMMAND.help: Compare router-id for identical EBGP paths

COMMAND.name: description
COMMAND.help: Assign a string describing the neighbor

PARAM.name: String
PARAM.help: Enter the string (max 80 characters) to describe neighbor/peer-group

COMMAND.name: ebgp-multihop
COMMAND.help: Allow EBGP neighbors not on directly connected networks

PARAM.name: template-name
PARAM.help: Name of peer-group from which to inherit

COMMAND.name: remote-as
shutdown
COMMAND.ACTION:
if test -n "${message}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_config_shutdown_message ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} ${MSG}
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_config_enabled ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} False
fi

COMMAND.name: advertisement-interval
COMMAND.help: Minimum interval between sending BGP routing updates

COMMAND.name: capability extended-nexthop
COMMAND.help: Advertise extended next-hop capability to the peer

COMMAND.name: capability dynamic
COMMAND.help: Advertise dynamic capability to this neighbor

COMMAND.name: disable-connected-check
COMMAND.help: One-hop away EBGP peer using loopback address

COMMAND.name: enforce-first-as
COMMAND.help: Enforce the first AS for EBGP routes

COMMAND.name: passive
COMMAND.help: Don't send open messages to this neighbor

COMMAND.name: solo
COMMAND.help: Solo peer - part of its own update group

PARAM.name: nhops
PARAM.help: Specify the maximum number of hops to the BGP peer

COMMAND.name: no description
COMMAND.help: Remove the string describing the neighbor or the peer-group

PARAM.name: String
PARAM.help: Enter the string (max 80 characters) to describe neighbor/peer-group

COMMAND.name: no ebgp-multihop
COMMAND.help: Allow EBGP neighbors not on directly connected networks

PARAM.name: template-name
PARAM.help: Name of peer-group from which to inherit

COMMAND.name: no shutdown
COMMAND.ACTION:
if test -n "${message}" ; then
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py delete_openconfig_bgp_ext_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_config_shutdown_message ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} ${MSG}
else
python $SONIC_CLI_ROOT/sonic-cli-bgp.py patch_openconfig_network_instance_network_instances_network_instance_protocols_protocol_bgp_neighbors_neighbor_config_enabled ${vrf-name} ${nbr-addr} True
fi

COMMAND.name: no advertisement-interval
COMMAND.help: Minimum interval between sending BGP routing updates

COMMAND.help: Advertise extended next-hop capability to the peer

COMMAND.name: no capability dynamic

COMMAND.help: Enforce the first AS for EBGP routes

COMMAND.help: Don't send open messages to this neighbor
